Dmitry Sviridenko

Front-end developer

About

  • Age : yo
  • City: Kharkov
  • XP: year
  • Like: Bike&Books
  • Love: Web-design

I try to perform the work at the highest quality, it is fully responsive and supports a wide range of devices. Each project is well-documented and code is written semantically, which would make the project easy to supporting for both me and third-party developers in the future.

I come up with a stylized and intermediate states of interactive elements, if they are not painted designer. Add animation, if you want to spice up the layout. I write scripts for client-side logic that would make content interactive.

Sites typeset cross-browser, IE9+ support, if necessary. Project is optimized before the handover - all the styles, scripts, images are compressed and glued together without any loss in quality.

Familiar with these methods and tools like Git, Jenkins, Bitbucket, Agile / Scrum, which will allow me to quickly join your team.

The development of love to experiment and use the latest technology from the world of the web, because it is fun :)

Skills

I build projects with gulp.js. To write a template I use the markup Jade, which will accelerate the development and to avoid duplication of code for a typical page blocks. To use styles preprocessors SASS (SCSS) and LESS. Also, bower and npm, without them anywhere :)

HTML5/CSS3
100%
JavaScript/jQuery
80%
Animation
85%

In many projects, customers require the ability to manage the content of your site. To achieve this, I integrate front-end templates and WordPress themes offer to implement user-defined functions using PHP.

WordPress
40%
PHP
30%

Designers do not always demonstrate all their ideas about design of the web-site. Two years of experience with the products of Adobe (Photoshop, Illustrator, and Fireworks) will be sufficient, which would help you to display all that has been lost. To create layouts and wireframes I prefer Sketch.

PhotoShop
80%
Illustrator
35%

Alter Systems

Website

View

Alter Systems

The company Alter Systems has been operating in the Ukrainian market since 2004. The story began with the implementation of the first project to create a corporate information system based on IFS Applications in the company "New Style Ukraine". In 2005, Alter Systems received the status of the official business partner of IFS CEE (Industrial and Financial Systems Central and Eastern Europe), and in 2016 - IFS Gold Channel Partner status.

Adaptive, IE10+, slider

Developed with AleGar

Apple Reanimator

Repair of Apple hardware of any complexity, from battery replacement and glass replacement, to a complex soldering component. This is a large network with a professional team, which was founded in the distant 2003.

MoGo
